featured.text: She would beam and put it in her best crystal vase.

definition.zh_def: 一種用來盛放花卉或裝飾的容器，通常由玻璃、陶瓷或塑料製成。
definition.en_def: A container, typically made of glass, ceramic, or plastic, used for holding flowers or as a decorative item.
definition.example: She placed a beautiful bouquet in the vase on the dining table.
